root.xslt:
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="3.0">
<xsl:output method="xml" omit-xml-declaration="yes"/>
<xsl:template match="/info"> <xsl:result-document href="result1.xml" method="xml"> <result1> <xsl:for-each select="*[position() lt 4]"> <xsl:element name="{name()}"> <xsl:value-of select="position()"/> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </result1> </xsl:result-document> <xsl:result-document href="result2.xml" method="xml"> <result2> <xsl:for-each select="*[position() ge 4]"> <xsl:element name="{name()}"> <xsl:value-of select="position() + 3"/> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </result2> </xsl:result-document> </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
